languages.text: {n}Пелена психического инея покрывает переборку у ваших ног. Вы, как и все присутствующие, ощущаете лишь отблески и тени кошмаров {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Эмпиреев{/g}, проникающие сквозь ослабшую Завесу, но в разуме раненого и испуганного человека варп чует легкую добычу и впивается в него. Мужчина начинает трястись, лицо скорчено в гримасе боли и ужаса, из носа хлещет кровь. Глаза закатываются, словно бедолага взирает внутрь собственной головы на вещи, которые не должно видеть живущим.{/n}

{n}A haze of psychic frost coats the floor at your feet. You and the rest perceive only glimpses and shadows of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Empyrean{/g} terrors creeping through the weakened veil, but the warp senses a weakness in the mind of the wounded and frightened man and sinks its claws deep. The prisoner begins to shake, his face contorted in a grimace of pain and horror, blood bursting from his nose. His eyes roll up as if to gaze inside his head at things that no living soul should have to witness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Una niebla de escarcha psíquica cubre el suelo bajo tus pies. Tanto tú como los demás solo podéis percibir atisbos y sombras de los terrores del {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Empíreo{/g} que asoman tras el velo debilitado, pero la disformidad siente la debilidad en la mente del hombre herido y aterrado y clava sus garras en lo más hondo. El prisionero convulsiona con el rostro contorsionado en una mueca de dolor y terror y la sangre brota a chorros de su nariz. Pone los ojos en blanco, como para ver en el interior de su cabeza cosas que ningún ser vivo debería presenciar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A haze of psychic frost coats the floor at your feet. You and the rest perceive only glimpses and shadows of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Empyrean{/g} terrors creeping through the weakened veil, but the warp senses a weakness in the mind of the wounded and frightened man and sinks its claws deep. The prisoner begins to shake, his face contorted in a grimace of pain and horror, blood bursting from his nose. His eyes roll up as if to gaze inside his head at things that no living soul should have to witness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Una niebla de escarcha psíquica cubre el suelo bajo tus pies. Tanto tú como los demás solo podéis percibir atisbos y sombras de los terrores del Empíreo que asoman tras el velo debilitado, pero la disformidad siente la debilidad en la mente del hombre herido y aterrado y clava sus garras en lo más hondo. El prisionero convulsiona con el rostro contorsionado en una mueca de dolor y terror y la sangre brota a chorros de su nariz. Pone los ojos en blanco, como para ver en el interior de su cabeza cosas que ningún ser vivo debería presenciar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}足元の床を精神的霜がもやになって覆う。あなたと他の者たちは、弱まったヴェールの隙間から忍び寄る{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}エンピリアン{/g}の恐怖の影を垣間見ることしかできないが、<歪み>は傷つき怯える男の心の弱さを感じ取り、その爪を深く食い込ませる。囚人は震え始め、苦痛と恐怖で顔を歪め、鼻から血を噴き出した。男は白目を剥いて、生きている魂が目撃すべきではないものを頭の中で見つめている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A haze of psychic frost coats the floor at your feet. You and the rest perceive only glimpses and shadows of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Empyrean{/g} terrors creeping through the weakened veil, but the warp senses a weakness in the mind of the wounded and frightened man and sinks its claws deep. The prisoner begins to shake, his face contorted in a grimace of pain and horror, blood bursting from his nose. His eyes roll up as if to gaze inside his head at things that no living soul should have to witness.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}足元の床を精神的霜がもやになって覆う。あなたと他の者たちは、弱まったヴェールの隙間から忍び寄るエンピリアンの恐怖の影を垣間見ることしかできないが、<歪み>は傷つき怯える男の心の弱さを感じ取り、その爪を深く食い込ませる。囚人は震え始め、苦痛と恐怖で顔を歪め、鼻から血を噴き出した。男は白目を剥いて、生きている魂が目撃すべきではないものを頭の中で見つめている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}你脚下的地面蒙上了一层灵能的薄霜。你和在场的其他人仅仅瞥到了{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}至高天{/g}恐怖的阴影，但亚空间感知到了恐惧之人心灵中的弱点。它的利爪刺穿了脆弱的障壁，伸向了犯人。犯人的身体不住颤抖，整张脸扭曲起来，充满了痛苦与恐惧，鲜血从他的鼻子里喷涌而出。他的双眼拼命上翻，脑海中充斥着活人根本不该看到的恐怖景象。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A haze of psychic frost coats the floor at your feet. You and the rest perceive only glimpses and shadows of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Empyrean{/g} terrors creeping through the weakened veil, but the warp senses a weakness in the mind of the wounded and frightened man and sinks its claws deep. The prisoner begins to shake, his face contorted in a grimace of pain and horror, blood bursting from his nose. His eyes roll up as if to gaze inside his head at things that no living soul should have to witness.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein Nebel aus psychischem Frost bedeckt den Boden zu deinen Füßen. Du und die anderen nehmen nur kurze Einblicke und Schatten der Schrecken des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Empyreums{/g} wahr, die durch den geschwächten Schleicher kriechen, doch der Warp spürt eine Schwäche im Verstand des verwundeten und verängstigten Mannes und bohrt sich tief in ihn hinein. Der Gefangene beginnt zu zittern. Sein Gesicht verzerrt sich zu einer Maske von Schmerz und Grauen, Blut schießt aus seiner Nase. Seine Augen rollen nach oben, als würden sie in seinen Kopf blicken wollen, auf die Dinge, die keine lebende Seele je sehen sollte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A haze of psychic frost coats the floor at your feet. languages.text: {n}Une brume de givre psychique recouvre le sol à vos pieds. Si vos hommes et vous-même ne décelez que des bribes et des ombres portées des horreurs {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}empyréennes{/g} qui filtrent à travers le voile affaibli, le Warp détecte une faille dans l'esprit de l'homme meurtri et terrifié, une faille dans laquelle il plonge aussitôt ses griffes. Le prisonnier se met à trembler, le visage contorsionné en une grimace de souffrance et d'effroi alors qu'un flot de sang jaillit de son nez. Ses yeux se révulsent, comme pour scruter du regard son propre cerveau envahi par des choses dont aucun être vivant ne devrait jamais être témoin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A haze of psychic frost coats the floor at your feet. languages.text: {n}Ruhsezi soğuğuyla bezenmiş bir pus, ayaklarının altındaki zemini kaplıyor. Geri kalanlarla birlikte zayıflayan örtü üzerinden sinsice süzülen {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Gök Diyar{/g} dehşetlerinin yalnızca muğlak görüntülerini ve gölgelerini algılayabiliyorsun. Fakat öteboyut, yaralı ve korku içindeki adamın zihninde bir zayıflık sezerek pençelerini daha da derine batırıyor. Mahkûm titremeye başlıyor. Yüzü, acı ve korkuyla eğrilip bükülmüş hâlde. Burnundan kan fışkırıyor. Gözleri, âdeta hiçbir fâninin tanık olmaması gereken kafasının içindeki şeylere bakmaya çalışırcasına yuvarlanıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}A haze of psychic frost coats the floor at your feet.
